alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 4:08AM MST until December 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 70 MPH possible. * WHERE...East Platte County including Glendo, Wheatland, and Chugwater. * WHEN...8 AM Wednesday until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
